text: Afsos, merī qaum is lie tabāh ho rahī hai ki wuh sahīh ilm nahīṅ rakhtī. Aur kyā ajab jab tum imāmoṅ ne yih ilm radd kar diyā hai. Ab maiṅ tumheṅ bhī radd kartā hūṅ. Āindā tum imām kī ḳhidmat adā nahīṅ karoge. Chūṅki tum apne Ḳhudā kī sharīat bhūl gae ho is lie maiṅ tumhārī aulād ko bhī bhūl jāūṅgā.
